name: Sticks (itch) (Muhammad Izha B Rahim)
description:
This game is made within 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2019:
https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/sticks

You play as a bird building a nest. Pickup sticks and drop them at your house!
CONTROLS:
A and D = Move Left and Right
SPACEBAR = Flap wings (The faster you flap, the higher you go!)
M/RightMouseButton = Pick up/Interact
F2 = Toggle Fullscreen

CHEATS:
O = Skip Level
